titles.title: A bill to amend the Temporary Emergency Food Assistance Act of 1983 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1989 and 1990.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition.

committee.subcommittee: Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 5/25/1988--Introduced. Amends the Temporary Emergency Food Assistance Act of 1983 to authorize FY 1989 and 1990 appropriations for the temporary emergency food assistance program. Extends program authority through FY 1990.
